function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inference of latent regions","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases through undetected regions","Mitigation":"Regular surveillance and monitoring of latent regions","Technologies":"Data analytics and machine learning algorithms for early detection","People":"Public in areas with undetected regions","Owner":"Health organizations and local authorities"},{"Description":"Temporal dynamics of topics","Impact":"Lack of understanding of how disease-related topics evolve over time","Mitigation":"Long-term monitoring and analysis of topic dynamics","Technologies":"Big data analytics and topic modeling algorithms","People":"Health researchers and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Network information between linked documents","Impact":"Propagation of misinformation and false data related to disease spread","Mitigation":"Validation of linked documents and fact-checking of information","Technologies":"Blockchain and verification algorithms for data authenticity","People":"Public relying on linked documents for health information","Owner":"Media organizations and content publishers"}]}
